name: StopSmokingCoach
0:
”Alexa, open Stop Smoking Coach.”
”Alexa, tell Stop Smoking Coach to give me a tip.”
”Alexa, tell Stop Smoking Coach to sign me up.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stop smoking coach
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Since 1992, Kick It California, a program operated by School of Medicine at UC San Diego, has provided free quit smoking and vaping services. With the Stop Smoking Coach skill, you can get quit smoking tips, which can be very helpful to have on hand for times when quitting gets tough, and you can also sign up to speak with a highly trained Kick It California Quit Coach.

Try saying things like:

“Alexa, ask Stop Smoking Coach for a stop smoking tip” to get a tip to help you quit smoking.

“Alexa, ask Stop Smoking Coach for a tip to stay quit” to get a tip on how to stay quit.

“Alexa, tell Stop Smoking Coach to sign me up” to enroll and speak to a Quit Coach

Note: Quit Coaching is available to those aged 13 or older.

The information in this skill is provided for educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
